// src/components/HowToPlay.js import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './HowToPlay.css'; // Import sample images (replace with your actual screenshots) import signupImg from '../assets/signup-screenshot.png'; import loginImg from '../assets/login-screenshot.png'; import createGameImg from '../assets/create-game-screenshot.png'; import joinGameImg from '../assets/join-game-screenshot.png'; import gameplayImg from '../assets/gameplay-screenshot.png'; import leaderboardImg from '../assets/leaderboard-screenshot.png'; import secretSetupImg from '../assets/secretSetupImg.png'; const HowToPlay = () => { return (
{/* Navigation Bar */}

NUMBERPOSITION

Home Leaderboard About

How to Play NUMBER POSITION

{/* Step 01 - Getting Started */}

01

Getting Started

✍️ Sign Up

Create your account using the signup form:

  • Unique username
  • Valid email address
  • Secure password

Sign Up

{error &&

{error}

}

Already have an account? Log In

🔑 Log In

Access your account using your credentials:

  • Registered email
  • Account password

Log In

{error &&

{error}

}

Don't have an account? Sign Up Here

{/* Step 02 - Game Setup */}

02

Game Setup

🆕 Create a Game

  1. Click "Create New Game"
  2. Wait for game ID generation
  3. Share ID with your opponent

Start Playing

{loggedIn && ( <>

Welcome, {user?.username}!

)}

🚪 Join a Game

  1. Click "Join Existing Game"
  2. Enter valid game ID
  3. Wait for host approval

Start Playing

{loggedIn && ( <>

Welcome, {user?.username}!

)}
{/* Step 03 - Secret Number Setup */}

03

Secret Number Setup

RULE

Creation Requirements

  • Must be 4 digits (0-9)
  • All digits must be unique
EXAMPLE

Valid/Invalid Numbers

Valid Numbers
1234
7853
Invalid Numbers
1123
5456
!

Your secret number remains hidden until game completion. Both players must set numbers before gameplay begins.

{/* Step 04 - Gameplay Mechanics */}

04

Gameplay Mechanics

Turn Structure

1
Enter 4-digit guess following validation rules
2
Receive feedback:
C = Correct Digits P = Correct Positions
3
Opponent's turn begins after feedback

Sample Round

3
5
2
9
C:2
P:1

2 correct digits, 1 in correct position

💡

Pro Strategy: Use feedback to eliminate impossible combinations and systematically narrow down possibilities.

{/* Step 05 - Leaderboards */}

05

Leaderboards & Rankings

W
Wins
L
Losses
D
Draws
  • Global ranking system
  • Performance statistics
  • Special achievement unlocks

Ready to Test Your Skills?

Challenge yourself and climb to the top of the leaderboard! Every game counts towards your ranking. The more you play, the higher you can climb!

Start Playing Now →

© {new Date().getFullYear()} Number Position Game. All rights reserved.

Privacy Policy | Terms of Service
); }; export default HowToPlay;
